Hawkins (ubochí irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Julaị 1895 rụo 1990) bụ onye America na-ese ihe ọdịnala nke ọrụ ya malitere inweta otuto na 1980s
Hawkins na-ejikarị mgbasa ozi dịgasị íchè íchè, gụnyere ihe ndị a tụfuru atụfu, iji mepụta ihe osise ya.
E gosipụtara ọrụ Hawkins na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka Smithsonian American Art Museum, American Folk Art Museum na New York City na San Diego's Mingei International Museum.
A haziri nnukwu ihe ngosi nkè ihe osise Hawkins na 2018 site na Columbus Museum of Art, Figge Art Museum na Davenport, Iowa.
